page.content: Dept., feels may be one of the most important things about car design in the future. He said that driver comfort is important for safe driving because the inside temperature of a car or the noise from the engine, for example, can make a lot of difference to a driver's alertness - particularly on a long journey. Other changes Mr. Cross predicted which would improve the safety of{all} road users included passenger compartments like safety shells, compulsory seatbelts in the rear of cars and 'soft' front and rears to cars. When he was asked to look even further into his crystal ball, Mr. Cross wondered whether electric cars or cars powered by hydrogen might not be the most likely cars of the future
